pageProduct.name: Palmers Skin Perfecting Moisturizing Day Cream SPF15 15g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Formula Skin Perfecting Moisturising Day Cream is a lightweight formula that gently hydrates, balances moisture, and smoothes skin texture. Travel size!

Warnings

This product contains sunscreen and may cause eye irritation. Please avoid the eye area when applying. For external use only. Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

With SPF 15 to protect from the sun's harmful rays, this nourishing formula is suitable for all skin types, and won't clog pores. It will leave your skin healthy, glowing and supply every day. Dermatologist Tested. Safe for Sensitive Skin.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Benzophenone-3, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Cetearyl Alcohol, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Methylpropanediol, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Cyclopentasiloxane, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Hydrogenated Palm Glycerides, Cyclohexasiloxane, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Dimethicone, Tocopherol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Hydrolyzed Milk Protein, Palmitoyl Tripepetide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Ceteareth-20, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Triethanolamine, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Carbomer, Disodium EDTA, Fragrance (Parfum), Glycerin, Steareth-20, N-Hydroxysuccinimide, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzonate, Coumarin. PARABEN FREE.

Directions

Apply daily to the face and neck area after cleansing, avoiding the eye area.
